metadata.description: Comprehensive list of potential risks identified for the research project

risks.description: Rapid evolution of agent communication protocols (ACP, A2A, MCP) may make research findings outdated
risks.context: Based on methodology limitations regarding protocol evolution speed
risks.potential_impact: High - Could affect relevance and applicability of research outcomes
risks.mitigation_hints: Consider modular design and continuous monitoring of protocol developments

risks.description: Integration challenges between HDT systems and existing DER infrastructure
risks.context: Complexity of DER systems and need for interoperability
risks.potential_impact: High - Could affect proof of concept development and validation
risks.mitigation_hints: Early stakeholder engagement and thorough system architecture planning

risks.description: Computational resource limitations affecting HDT performance and scalability
risks.context: Environmental considerations and resource efficiency requirements
risks.potential_impact: Medium - Could impact prototype development and testing
risks.mitigation_hints: Optimize algorithms and consider cloud-based solutions

risks.description: Limited access to real-world DER operation data for validation
risks.potential_impact: High - Could affect research validity and generalizability
risks.mitigation_hints: Use simulated scenarios and expert validation

risks.description: Challenges in evaluating human-agent collaboration effectiveness
risks.context: Complexity of human factors in HDT operations
risks.mitigation_hints: Develop comprehensive evaluation metrics and involve diverse user groups

risks.description: Difficulty in comparing different agent communication protocols
risks.context: Need for fair and comprehensive comparison framework
risks.mitigation_hints: Develop clear comparison criteria and metrics

risks.description: Time constraints affecting research depth and quality
risks.mitigation_hints: Prioritize tasks and maintain clear focus

risks.description: Limited access to specialized expertise or tools
risks.mitigation_hints: Leverage open-source tools and seek expert consultation

risks.potential_impact: Medium - Could affect proof of concept scope
risks.mitigation_hints: Use cost-effective development approaches and prioritize essential features

risks.description: Potential negative social impact on DER workers
risks.context: Social impact analysis and equity considerations
risks.potential_impact: High - Could affect adoption and ethical implications
risks.mitigation_hints: Involve workers in design process and ensure benefits are equitably distributed

risks.description: Environmental impact of increased computational requirements

risks.mitigation_hints: Regular review of regulatory requirements and compliance measures

risks.description: Delays in systematic literature review affecting subsequent phases
risks.potential_impact: High - Could cascade through project phases
risks.mitigation_hints: Set clear milestones and maintain regular progress reviews

risks.description: Prototype development taking longer than anticipated
risks.mitigation_hints: Use agile development approach and maintain clear scope

risks.context: Need for iterative development and validation
risks.mitigation_hints: Plan for feedback cycles and maintain clear communication channels
